cohortName: [PL 4164770001] Guillain-Barré syndrome referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4164770) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4164770002] Guillain-Barré syndrome referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4164770) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4164770003] Guillain-Barre syndrome inpatient (Arya et al, ScallenWalter et al, Iqbal et al, Anandan et al, Rasmussen et al. Baxter et al.)
